title: My Husband Likes Ramps And Rumps
itunes:title: My Husband Likes Ramps And Rumps
description:
Hello Steve and Shirley, I need your advice on an issue between my husband and I. We have been married for a year and he’s a wonderful husband, but we are not seeing eye to eye on how he reacts to well-endowed women. When we were dating, he always had a thing for admiring women in my presence. He didn’t care if they had two heads, but if they had big boobies or a big ole butt, his head was on the swivel and he would just stare. Lucky for him, I’m not insecure and I never made a big deal of it.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
